quote: Oh dear. I'm quite unprepared. Here. I hope you enjoy.
I hope this isn't too light for you.
I hope you enjoy chocolate. This goes quite well in cookies too.
Trick or treat. Things that are bittersweet are quite addicting, don't you think? Even sweets.
Perhaps this can balance out all of the sweetness?
Sometimes you have to try something in its initial state to truly appreciate the way it ends up at the end. Don't you think?
